value.title: DAX Fridays! #84: Get values from another table with inactive relationships
value.excerpt: It is world's cup fever: FIFA world cup 2018 in Russia!!! And we dont want to miss anything right? value.title: DAX Fridays! #85: Difference between dates in the same column
value.excerpt: Do you know how to calculate the difference between dates when both are in the same column? If you want to calculate how many dates go between users changing subscriptions, this DAX measure will help you.  To

value.title: DAX Fridays! #98: NORM.DIST | Predicting Kevin Durant Scores
